Summary: north to south, glowing, thought it was a star untill it changed direction and disappered
divs: Sighting Detailsnorth to south, glowing, thought it was a star untill it changed direction and disappered. while it move it would quickly zigzag like a heart monitor does. lasted about 10 min then the glowing got smaller till it was gone. their is an air force base very close by. when it was over it, the glowing got brighter.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pittsburg
There were no other sightings in Pittsburg on or around June 11th 2012
